items.title: NASA Uses Generative AI to Navigate Mars with Perseverance Rover
items.content_text: In a first for planetary exploration, NASA utilized generative AI to map routes for the Perseverance rover, cutting planning time and increasing science returns.

items.title: Networks Keeping NASA’s Artemis II Mission Connected
items.content_text: Artemis missions rely on both the Near Space Network, managed by NASA Goddard, and the Deep Space Network, managed by the Jet Propulsion Laboratory.

items.title: November 2025 Company Update
items.content_text: Throughout November, the Terran R program made key advancements across design, build, test, and launch operations.
